problem.markdown:
Here's a different joke for you.
The chemistry students played on their phones, chatted with each other, and otherwise generally ignored their poor professor. What did the professor do?
>>Select the answer that matches<<
[x] He looked at his inattentive students, sighed, frowned, looked into the camera and said, 'Nitride.'" [ ] He threw his shoe at them. [ ] He got out his phone and read the news.
